WHO ARE WE

What is PARBO, if u ask the simple way to say is, it is an non profitable organization, establish to help the ones who are in need all over the Bangladesh , but in other words, it’s a group of friends, collaborate together for an attempt to put smiles over the faces of kids & people who are in great deprivation.
